Game.Name: Monster Farm Advance 2 (Japan)
Game.plot: Monster Rancher Advance®2™ is a sequel to the popular role-playing game with all new monster breeding and battling elements. Still fitting in a compact portable Game Pak it's perfect for gaming on the go!All of those loveable characters from the popular Monster Rancher universe are back! Players can now enjoy all the fun of raising, training, and fighting with their unique monsters, as they battle against rival breeders or their friends in global monster tournaments. Rise through the breeder ranks and bring glory to your association while striving to become the top monster breeder in this land.Cheat: Zuum-GolizardsAt the Shrine enter the case sensative code 9677581. You will get a gold-colored Zuum named Golizards with stats all over 100.Cheat: Unlock "rare" monsters.These monsters can be gotten by entering the shrine and inserting the password.
